6 class pose_correction : public service {
7 public:
8 
9  // In the future this service will be pose predict which will predict a pose some t in the future
10  pose_type* correct_pose(pose_type* pose) {
11  pose_type* swapped_pose = new pose_type(*pose);
12 
13  // This uses the OpenVINS standard output coordinate system.
14  // This is a mapping between the OV coordinate system and the OpenGL system.
15  swapped_pose->position.x() = -pose->position.y();
16  swapped_pose->position.y() = pose->position.z();
17  swapped_pose->position.z() = -pose->position.x();
18 
19  // There is a slight issue with the orientations: basically,
20  // the output orientation acts as though the "top of the head" is the
21  // forward direction, and the "eye direction" is the up direction.
22  // Can be offset with an initial "calibration quaternion."
23  swapped_pose->orientation.w() = pose->orientation.w();
24  swapped_pose->orientation.x() = -pose->orientation.y();
25  swapped_pose->orientation.y() = pose->orientation.z();
26  swapped_pose->orientation.z() = -pose->orientation.x();
27 
28  return swapped_pose;
29  }
30 };
